p.s: The speech at hand is a speech which was held by Sir David Attenborough, an English broadcaster, natural historian and author, who opened as people's advocate at COP26 climate summit in Glasgow.
His speech was accompanied by cinematic pictures and statements from several speakers showed on huge screens behind him.

In his speech, Sir David refers to the history of humanity, reminding his audience of the drastic changes in global temperatures many thousands of years ago and that it was the stabilization of temperature, that has allowed us to build civilization.
However, our way of life and specifically our usage of fossil fuel energy has endangered humanity once again.
He goes on to say that our shortsightedness has put us in the position we are in today and proposes a complete renewal of our way of producing as the solution.
Finally, Sir David emphasizes the importance of acting united once again and urges the attendees to take quick action, especially for the sake of the younger, as well as future generations.
